titleStmt.title: To the King's Most Excellent Majesty, the humble address of the atheists, or, the Sect of the Epicureans
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

notesStmt.note: At end: From the Devil-tavern, the fifth of November, 1688. Presented by Justice Baldock and was graciously received.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
